snippet: PERLMAN--Claire Field. The Staff and Board of Directors of the Samuel Field Y mourn the loss of Claire Perlman, our devoted Lifetime Trustee and benefactor. Claire and her family have carried forth the commitment to community service established by our founders, Helen and Samuel Field. Our deepest sympathies are extended to the entire Perlman family. Lawrence Gottlieb, President Jeri Mendelsohn, Exec. VP & CEO 1/3
